hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The inscription on the ring of the Messenger of Allah [SAW] was: Muhammad Rasul Allah (Muhammad the Messenger of Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَنَقْشِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Description of the Ring of the Prophet (ﷺ) [ﷺ] and its Inscription
